posts.post_content:
A nice collector sent my way an Obak (175 subjects) card of Nelson, Oakland. It doesn't really fit my collection, so if someone would like it, just post here and I'll e-mail you for your address and mail it to you free of charge. All I ask is that it's for your collection and not for resale. The card is ungraded with multiple creases.

No e-mails, please. First post here gets it, and I'll be in touch.

Thanks, Rob
